content.detailedDescription: At approximately 3:30am my son and i were outside our apartment trying to view the meteor show. i was looking northeast when something caught my eye moving to the south. i turned and viewed an amorphous mass of nothing for about 1 minute moving toward the southern horizon at a high rate of speed. it passed behind a group of trees and based on previous viewing of aircraft landing and taking off at a nearby airport, i would place the altitude at between 500 to 1000 meters. the object quickly accelerated and vanished toward the southern horizon. the object had no identifiable shape other than blob-like and an empty grey color. it was like looking into a hole that you cannot see the bottom of but as it moved it did block out the stars behind it. my son saw 'something' but was looking in a slightly different direction from me so i cannot say he saw the same object. having seen aircraft and helicopters in the same area during the day and night i can safely say this was not an aircraft of any design. in fact i think i would be safe in saying it was not a structured object at all.
content.summary: Grey amorphous mass

content.detailedDescription: It was only about a half hour to 45 minutes after the ball dropped on new years. my mom and i were out front with the dog when she suddenly points up and says "oh look a shooting....." then realizing it wasn't a shooting star. she pointed it out to me and at the time i had a 5mw laser with a visible beam. so i shined the object and it seemed to take a speeding path in almost what seemed to be a zig zag form. while i was shining the laser, you could clearly see the path that this object was taking in the dark sky. it had no lights that we noticed. it was very fast and after a brief moment or two, it disappeared into the sky. at one point it was almost directly over top of us. we were in complete awe, as my mom and i have never seen anything like this in our lives. i had friends call me crazy and laugh in my face, i know what i saw and believe this isn't anything that we know about.
content.summary: Oblong shaped, light grey, very fast! no lights

content.detailedDescription: About 1930 military time;perhaps a little later 1/4/2012 obderver bright yellow light over monterey, ca.  light was bright yellow much large than star, in southern sky heading toward airport.  light was moving fast at first, then appeared to slow as near airport/hills between monterey salinas.  then dissapeared (or out of sight).  event witnessed by myself and 2 friends who where on porch at time.
content.summary: Large yellow light near monterey airport observed, fast in one direstion then slowed, changed direstions, dissapeared toward hills.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen ufo's before but never took out a camera. but last night i did!!!!  it last too long for me to stay out and see or observe how it took off - that's usually the best part!  super fast - faster than the blink of an eye.  i first saw 9 ufo's in 1975 riding passenger in my husband's car on the fwy of idaho. i worked at an abc news station and saw them in the sky after work. after a while one dropped from the sky and hovered above the land for a few sec.S and then took off so fast at a 45 degree angle into space - so fast you couldn't see it after it shot off!!!  i had 2 sightings that same year (75) but a whole 25 years later is when i started seeing them again? why me i have no idea, but in san clemente, ca. before moving here to the palm springs area, we both saw a huge amount of ufo's one night that we even had a neighbor see them too!  but it was never in the paper so we never spoke of it - that is until today.  i never usually see the same type of ufo  repeatedly just different types and they do different things each time too.  you can call me - interview me - i don't care but i never usually speak about this to acquaintances or family and friends because of fear of ridicule.  but i do remember the 1st ufo's - the 9 in formation in idaho  that i told the news director at abc and the very next day after telling him he found an article in the paper of others seeing my (exact) same description  "in all the western united states  seeing 6 or nine red, white and blue, maybe green, lights in the sky" just as i had told him the day before.  he was freaked out needless to say!!! 
i knew they were real from that day on.  p.S. i even have a daughter in navy intelligence who was stationed in guam years ago when she and a fellow navy girl were out to eat at a restaurant. out of the window they saw 2 ufo's out the window - she said, warbling? like they were going to crash but didn't - zoomed over the restaurant and then back over the restaurant again and shortly took off but neither girl ever reported to their chiefs. she knows more about "them" than i do.  
p.S. i did take a video last night but i do not know how to attach it.
content.summary: 1 object i have video

content.detailedDescription: My brother inlaw and i were sitting on the trampoline out the back of our house in cranbourne watching the stars for about half an hour. after our eyes had adjusted we could see dim stars that weren't visible befor. we noticed at about the same time nearly directly above us there were seven very dim red lights,they looked like very small red stars hovering for about a minute. we both made comments about them then five flew off to the north and two went to the south overtaking each other in a slightly zig zag pattern almost like they were playing. both of us observed the two until we couldn't see them any more,not that they shot off they just got to dim, don't know what the other five did .They did get up to speed pretty quick. i don't know if we have anything that can hover that high up or why seven air craft would meet up like that then go separate ways. it is annoying because i don't think i will ever know what they were but i can be sure we both saw something strange that night just wish i had a definitive answer.
content.summary: Seven very dim red lights

content.detailedDescription: Fiery meteorite seen falling straight down fast east of i-71 and north of route 30.  seen from living room while at home looking out window.
content.summary: Fiery meteorite seen east of i-71 and north of route 30

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at 4:45 am drinking coffee outside looking up at the stars when a light that looked like a star came into view. it was over a mile up and looked like another star when i noticed it was moving fast across the sky. it took less than 30 seconds to pass over the entire night sky. estimated speed 15,000-50,000 mph. the path was a little wobbled in kind of a slight zigzag movement. i thought it could be a satellite except it wasn't moving in a straight line.It was so high up it looked like another star. it had no flashing lights like a plane would. i live near the airport so no planes are ever that high up and never move that fast or in a zigzag pattern like this one did.Moved way too fast and was too high up to be a jet. moved too slow and erratic to be a comet or satellite.I am going back outside to watch for others. i felt like it was ignoring me, unlike my last sighting in 1982 when i saw the boomerang craft up close in  hudson valley,ny. that time i felt like they knew i was watching.
content.summary: Zigzag path across the night sky too slow to be a comet and too fast to be a plane

content.detailedDescription: The oval ufo went east from the area of eagle toward east boise, it followed near the river in the direction of the foothills, i tried to follow the path it took toward the foothills near camels back park, i only sighted a red fox, it was at 4am mst it was a glowing white oval, i belive it landed.I was driving, i was astonished to see it i have them before headed from owyhee mountains to northern mountains past cascade.
content.summary: White glowing oval

content.detailedDescription: This event was repeated two nights in a row, approx. 40 minutes per event! i don't have a camera, so took pics with my cell phone last night and they are amazing!!!! zooming in and scanning around, there are, literally, hundreds of objects involved! i am on a mountaintop in ny and saw the same super bright and huge light (dwarfed planes passing by)..... morphed and changed shape many times, tons of colored orbs and weird shaped objects. then, after about forty minutes, disappeared..... i have a lot of cell phone pics.... should i send you some? cannot hook my phone up to pc so i will have to send directly from my phone! oh, and two nights ago, my friend witnessed this same thing with me.... let me know what i should do... so, i need either a cell number to send photo message via text, or an email address.....
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cone,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Upstate ny, two nights in a row!

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs in my backyard and i have always been interested in ufo's. i believe in them and have always looked to the skies for an opportunity to see one.

i thought the object was a star or meteor because there was a shower occurring the same night. 

i looked to the sw and the bright object caught my attention. i kept asking myself if it was a star, plane, or other object. i decided to go in my home and bring my wife out to look at it as well. when we returned to look at the object it had moved and that was when i knew it was not a star and had to be some type of flying object. i brought my video camera and binoculars with me and tried to look at it first with the binoculars then take film of it. my wife looked at it through the binoculars and her first impression was that it was a star but was really to big to be a star. she also concluded that it could not be a star because it had changed positions in the sky. we were slowly stepping back from where we started. 

i then went and got my friend and he came out to take a look and he saw the object move from left to right very quickly. while all of this was going on i started to film the object but have to admit that looking at the object through the binoculars was much more clear. the object was at a distance and my video camera could not really focus on the object for a clear view. you can see the pulsating lights though and it was revolving very quickly with red, blue, and green light. the lights were turning in a clockwise motion very quickly changing from the three colors i mentioned before. the object was in continuous motion because i had to change my footing each time the object moved. i was on top of a car in my driveway at this time. i did start filming from ground level. the object was traveling to the west and as far as i could tell from past experiences seeing helicopters flying around the city from my home was that it was approximately over the city of west los angeles/westwood/santa monica areas. as i am filming i am trying to keep my hand as still as possible and i know that i was not moving as much as the film suggests. my friend who witnessed me filming told me that he was looking at me and my filming and that there was no way i was moving around as much as the object was in the film. when viewing the object through the binoculars you could not tell it was making the movements that you could see through the film. when looking at it through the binoculars the object was just pulsating the three lights. you could actually see that with the naked eye. when i was filming you could see the rapid movements of the object through the viewfinder. we were amazed at how quickly it moved from one point to the next in a zig zag trail. all along it was still going out towards the west. though the film is blurred you can see the pulsating lights in the clockwise motion and can tell that it is not a star, helicopter, plane, or any other type of manned vehicle we know of. 

we tried to debunk and rule out everything we could before we figured it was an ufo. we just want to know if there were any reports of strange lights at all anywhere in the greater los angeles area especially in the before mentioned cities. my wife thought it was a star and looked up how stars move on line but she ruled that out. i had already ruled that out because there was always movement by the object. it wasn't a meteor from the shower because of the pulsating lights. it was not a helicopter because to our knowledge there are no helicopters with lights that act the way these did. plane ruled out completely after we saw the rapid movement of the object. 

also, just before i started to film there were two helicopters that i saw. one was your standard law enforcement helicopter but the other had only white/cream colored lights and they were much brighter than your normal beacons on helicopters. as a matter of fact we saw that the law enforcement helicopter has a red beacon and spotlight but again the second helicopter only had what looked like two large light white/cream in color and it speeded towards the object. i did not follow that helicopter but it was flying in that general direction heading west while the law enforcement helicopter proceeded over my home towards the hollywood hills. the duration of time between the time i saw the first helicopter going towards the object and the law enforcement helicopter passing over my home was probably about 30 seconds. the law enforcement helicopter had to have seen the unidentified helicopter.

this event was very exciting to us as my wife is a skeptic even she said she could not explain what the object was. we all had never seen anything like this object before. we still are in disbelief in terms of how we never thought we would see a ufo.

thanks for your time and i hope you have some answers for us one way or the other.

witnesses...

(witness names moved to fi box) cms 01/05/12 03:36 cst flg
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Nothing i have seen before.

witnesses...

keith/denise terao
leonard tillie
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Nothing i have seen before.

content.detailedDescription:
On new years eve i was reading a book at midnight when at five after i received a phone call from my sister.  grabbing my cup of coffee, i went outside to talk. (i was in richmond hill looking south-southwest)
  as i was watching all the rockets and such going off, i noticed one orange ball flying up at a 325 (est) degree angle.  i told my sister it looked as if someone had fired an army flare.  it didn't explode but kept going up, then went in a horizontal plane to the east.  i went further into the yard to watch and noticed another orange ball shooting up at a 45 degree (est) angle heading to the west.  it just stopped and hovered while the first one also stopped and hovered.  i then noticed there were two more orange balls above the first two creating an image of a lopsided box.  i had not seen them arrive.  the topmost ball semed to have two shallow elipses (one top, one bottom).  they did not pulse or anything and had no tails while shooting upwards.  they hung there; occasionally moving up, down or sidewards but maintaining their positions for the period of time it takes to smoke an entire cigarette plus a few more minutes.  they appeared from my position to be the size of an aspirin and an eisenhower dollar would have covered the entire scene.  they appeared at around the 2300 mark looking south.  they all seemed to fade from view within a minute or so.  perhaps heading south?
i had no camera avilable, but wrote down the details immediately afterwards.
content.summary: Four globes.  two stationary, bottom two approaching from opposing directions.  hovered for about 7 minutes and faded from view.

content.detailedDescription: I had returned home on dec.19,2011 at 19:30 hrs est. and started unloading a few groceries into my garage.In the process of doing that i look into the sky and noticed what appeared to be a small group of  three circular cloud or misty like objects hovering about 150 to 250 feet in the air at about a 60 degree elavation.It appeared a bit unusaul at first and i was about to continue unloading items when a fourth object appeared moving in a zig zag pattern leaving a bright orange trail behind it until it moved into close proximity of the other three objects.They hovered for about one minute and then began rotating in a clockwise direction at about 20 to 30 feet apart at equal distance from each other.I would not have paid much attention had i not noticed the fourth object arrive.I watch them rotate in a circular pattern and the merge into one object which appeared to spin then break up into four object again and repeat the process over again. i tried to determine what it was and looked around to see if anything could be causing it. i was convinced it was nothing like search light or anything else that  was making what i was witnessing. i walked toward the oject and they huddled together and moved away. the closer i got to them the more they moved away i was amazed and curious. i looked around to see if i could find a neighbor to confirm what was happening and no one appeared to be home so i proceeded to my house to awaken my son to witness this event. he proceeds outside and i said observe this and see what happens when i approach them . he watched and his exact words were that is really creepy. this continued for about 30 minutes from when i first noticed them. they continued  as we went inside as tempeture was 45 degrees outside.Intering into the house he said they were ufo 's i said ,i have work on submarines,aircraft carriers,airplanes and heliocopters and i don't know what they were but i have never seeen anything like what we had seen. it started to rain about 15 minute after intering the house i went back outside to check on them and they were gone.I had made an attemt to photogragh them with my cell phone but having a  lower grade cell phone the attempt photogragh them was not successful.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 hovering objects rotating in a circle merging into one object separating and repeating the same process over and over. process

content.detailedDescription: In the doorway of my apartment while smoking, i looked to the stars as i always viewed them as beautiful. noted a extra large starlike object which illuminated the sky and a ray shining downward from the object, lasting 7 to 10 minutes. then the ray stopped beaming from the starlike object. it had me so mesmerized i couldn't turn away,then i became frighten because i have viewed other sittings in the past, once in the same town, (though that siteing noted a different shape and appearance) the other siteing was in  in new york. i contacted you all once before, but after you questioned me and i attempted to share this info. with a family member, i was afraid my family would think i was losing it, so i threw out the paperwork you sent me . for you all had asked for a drawing of my encounter or viewing of my siteing of approx. 30 years ago in rochester, new york. sorry about this but it was somewhat frightening to me and made me questioned myself, "had i actually viewed these things?" now that the questionable siteing are more frequent (twice in last couple of years), seeing strange illuminations in the sky, i can't help but wonder if a ufo has invaded our planet. prayerfully, no harm shall come to us. if it's ok, i like to continue to report if indeed i view any additional siteing's. and yes, i had my glasses on. a question you proposed to me before. thanks for viewing my info.
content.summary: Very bright light w/beam shining downward, above the hills in vacaville, ca.

content.detailedDescription: In the doorway of my apartment while smoking, i looked to the stars as i always viewed them as beautiful. noted a extra large starlike object which illuminated the sky and a ray shining downward from the object, lasting 7 to 10 minutes. then the ray stopped beaming from the starlike object. it had me so mesmerized i couldn't turn away,then i became frighten because i have viewed other sittings in the past, once in the same town, (though that siteing noted a different shape and appearance) the other siteing was in  in new york. i contacted you all once before, but after you questioned me and i attempted to share this info. with a family member, i was afraid my family would think i was losing it, so i threw out the paperwork you sent me . for you all had asked for a drawing of my encounter or viewing of my siteing of approx. 30 years ago in rochester, new york. sorry about this but it was somewhat frightening to me and made me questioned myself, "had i actually viewed these things?" now that the questionable siteing are more frequent (twice in last couple of years), seeing strange illuminations in the sky, i can't help but wonder if a ufo has invaded our planet. prayerfully, no harm shall come to us. if it's ok, i like to continue to report if indeed i view any additional siteing's. and yes, i had my glasses on. a question you proposed to me before. thanks for viewing my info.
content.summary: Very bright light w/beam shining downward, above the hills in vacaville, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking through the town of capilla del monte, in central argentina on 12/19/11.  i was taking photos of the "cerro uritorco" a famous mountain in the cordoba de sierras mountain range.  i took five photos of the mountain as i walked towards the downtown area.  the last photo i took was at 7:22 pm local time.  approximately the same time i took the photo, i had a very strange sensation in my chest".  it was very noticeable, almost like a nervous feeling in the stomach, but it was centered above my sternum. i did not see anything abnormal.

when i returned to my hotel and downloaded the photos, in one of the pictures (taken at 7:22pm),  i observed two metallic objects, directly above each other to the left of the mountain face.  one is very small, but square-shaped when zoomed in on.  the second is very large, but blurry, towards the top of the photo.

there were no planes, helicopters or birds at the time the photo was taken.  in fact, i had not seen a plane or helicopter at all during the day.

im attaching two photos, the first, contains the anomalies, the second, is the photo i took four minutes before.
content.summary: Caught 2 metallic-like objects with my camera above mount uritorco in argentina

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a 8 stories high apartment, so i was able to see the whole event without anything blocking our way.  although you can't see the light trails in the video, this thing accelerates, it shoots off with a long streak of light and the speed was nothing you can find in this planet, unbelievable.

this thing is only visible in the camera when it stops or hovers, or when it starts pulsating some sort of a light to accelerate.  guess when it shoots off, there's not enough light source for a digital camera on a 30fps video mode.

for those debunkers out there: what we saw that night, we saw what we saw.  you can call it birds or bats... don't matter to us anymore what you all will say.

for those who saw something similar or even more dramatic, probably care less what others think as well...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Triangle shaped, beacons top and bottom, red and blue...

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Went out to blanket the horses and collect some kindling for the woodstove when i looked at the moon and the pretty ring around it. to the west and north of the moon from my vantage point was what looked like a bright planet, and i remarked to myself that it might be venus, and that she was really big and bright so close to the moon. 

and then it moved.

it approached my position and hovered just a little west of the back of my property. it executed slow and graceful figure eights and other patterns, almost as if it were swimming in the sky. it was a light yellow/gold color, and i noticed as it moved that it would occasionally emit what looked like white sparks of light from its surface. i went to the house to get my sony handycam and as i did so, the object moved in the direction i went, keeping the distance between us relatively the same. when i came back out, it was still there, and i took several really bad videos of it that i will upload as soon as i can. some friends came over while i was checking out the video and i hurried them outside to the site i'd seen the object. 

it was still there.

it displayed the same behavior with them that it did when i first noticed it and will . several planes came into the area and the object became still while they passed. none of the planes seemed to notice the object.

just went back out and looked.

it's still there!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object hovering, moving in geometric patterns, figure eights, for over an hour and is still there as i write this

content.detailedDescription:
I was pulling out of my subdivision stonebridge crossing, turned east on virginia ave when i saw a low hovering amber/gold blow about 100 - 200 feet above the trees.  the light first appeared round then looked to flowing like it had a tail.  initially i thought the home builder had a balloon floating in the air, but there were no stings or flags coming down to a fixed point on the ground.  the light was no blinking and way too big for a helicopter and was no way an airplane b/c was too low to the ground a stationary.  on the night of the event it was cold out, with low cloud cover.  as i approached the stop light at virginia and lake forest blvd i noticed the light had moved a little bit for where it was orig. stationed.  once i stopped at the light, the object's light turned off and a huge black triangle shaped object appeared with no lights, no sign of any engines, blades, etc., and made absolutely no sound.  i had all my windows down and sunroof so i could clearly make out the dark object hovering there completely still.  the black object  hovered high enough to not reflect any ground lights, but low enough to not reflect any light reflecting off the low cloud cover.  the object was blacker than the night sky that would appear between the cloud cover as the clouds raced eastward.  it hovered there for about 15 - 20 seconds and then moved in a straight line east/north east with out a sound; completely stealth.  i could make out the black object as it moved east/northeast because it was darker than the sky and the clouds.  once the light turned green i crossed lake forest blvd traveling east, raced down the small hill and up to the top of the hill where i had a great view of the sky and the area the object traveled, but it was no where in sight.  

the object traveled on a complete straight path, like it was flying on a perfect flat plane with no swaying.  it's like object put out a mast and sailed with the wind in a complete straight path with no wavering or sound.  i couldn't believe what i saw and tried several drive to several hill tops that give me a clear view of the night sky and the huge object was no where to be seen.

what i saw that night has bugged me for months and months and i'd love to know what i saw that night.  whatever it was defined all logic and any technology i'm aware of.
content.summary: Turn out of subdivision, observed big, lower hovering amber/gold light, drove closer, light turned off, huge black object appeared hovering, then moved w/o sound e/ne

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the highway (52) and saw a strange light in the air and it flew over the river and the gained speed and flew off.
content.summary: I was driving down the highway (52) and saw a strange light.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my window and seen red, blue, yellow, purple and green lights but was really far away. at first glance i thought it was a helicopter or an airplane. but when i looked out the window a few minutes later it was stil there. i foucused on the lights for a few minutes trying to see if it was a helicopter. i couldnt tell so i got my telescope and tried viewing it. i noticed it looked like it was spinning in one spot so i grabbed my camera and went outside to take a picture. the light did look like an object but was not circle. but since it was spinning it looked like a circle. when i snapped the picture a bunch of lights formed around it as if it was more than one object leaving a trail of lights all over. so i believe this was a ufo sighting
content.summary: Seen outside in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my window and seen red, blue, yellow, purple and green lights but was really far away. at first glance i thought it was a helicopter or an airplane. but when i looked out the window a few minutes later it was stil there. i foucused on the lights for a few minutes trying to see if it was a helicopter. i couldnt tell so i got my telescope and tried viewing it. i noticed it looked like it was spinning in one spot so i grabbed my camera and went outside to take a picture. the light did look like an object but was not circle. but since it was spinning it looked like a circle. when i snapped the picture a bunch of lights formed around it as if it was more than one object leaving a trail of lights all over. so i believe this was a ufo sighting
content.summary: Seen outside in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
November 5, 2011 - i was going to bed and decided for some strange reason to look out the window.  the blinking light caught my eye and at first i thought it was an airplane, but then i noticed it was staying sort of stationary.  then after looking at it, i realized, no, it wasn���t stationary, it was moving slightly left then right, then left then right, the up, then down, then left then right, etc.  it also changed shapes, and the colored lights changed from red to blue to green to yellow, etc.

in wonder, i yelled for my husband to come see.  he was downstairs, i was up.  instead, he yelled, ���what is it?��� to which i told him i was looking at a ufo.  he looked out the window and just moments later yelled, ���i see it!��� and then verified where in the sky i was seeing it.

it continued to ���wiggle��� in the sky and change colors.  it also changed shapes from round or spherical to oblong or blimp shape.  as it changed shapes, the colors changed.  it was almost like it was rotating.  we called our son who lives about 1/6 mile down the road.  he went outside and he saw it too.  he reported seeing the shape stay the same, but the colors changing and it appearing to move.

we could see the color changing and movement with the naked eye.  we looked at it through the binoculars, and it was definitely colored.  it was like looking into a spectrum.  all kinds of color!  yet the next time you looked at through the binoculars it was all white.  mostly it was colored.

it appeared to be high in the sky like a star, light up like a plane, and hovering like a helicopter.  it was too high to be a helicopter and it didn���t make any noise that we heard.  it stayed in the night sky and we decided to go to bed.  the next day, i posted on facebook and friends told me it was a planet or comet or something.

november 6, 2011 ���again, we saw the same ufo in the night sky, again changing colors just as much, but moving back and forth and up and down just a little less.  of course- when we saw it this night, we were at my son���s house and remember he didn���t report seeing the same movement we did.

january 3, 2012 - my best friend ��� who lives about 15 miles away saw a ufo, possibly the same one.  

tonight, january 4, 2012 - due to her sighting, i looked into the night sky, and the color changing orb is back.  movement is not as strong, but the color changing is definitely there.  we talked on the phone and although trees and such near her house made it where she couldn���t see it earlier in the night, she did spot it later this evening.

commentary - it might be a star or planet or something, and maybe pollution is causing the colors, but what is causing the movement?  it is usually about in the same spot (when it���s out there ��� it���s not always there) near orion���s belt.
content.summary: Color changing, spinning, shape changing, light that stayed in same general location, but moved up and down, and side to side.

content.detailedDescription: Please let me know if you have an explination for this, i did photoshop these to get more contrast..Contact me if you would like more i do have about 6 or 7 total, also if you would like the originals feel free to contact me

content.summary: Before i got my camera from my house i could see it much better it was red with two white lights that looked like headlights on a car, it seemed to be attracted to the trails behind the jets

content.detailedDescription: I was preparing myself to go hunting the morning of january 4th 2012. i walked outside to see if my hunting buddy was ready to go we was'nt sure if we were going because of how cold it was going to be. he is my neighbor directly next door. i stood on my front steps drinking my coffee and smoking a cigarette. i looked through his front door to see if i see him but his lights were off so i figured he wasn't ready yet so i decided to stay outside and wait for him. i strangly noticed how warm it was out when the temperature was around 15 degress farenheit and i did'nt have a hat or gloves on. i proceeded to sit on my railing on my front patio for about a minute or two. i stood back up then walk over two the front of my door just standing there drinking my coffee and smoking my cigarette. at about 4:39 a.M. i noticed lights appearing from up the street approaching from behind the houses on my side of the street. as the light were getting closer i noticed the craft was descending at the first instant i though it was a plane but i realised i did'nt hear any noise so i figured the the engines did not work and it was about to crash but as soon as it got directly across the street from my house i heard a low airplane sound normally like you'll hear when there real high but this thing was just above roof about 10 feet there was a white light in front like it would have been landing gear lights or something than it was two white wing lights one on each side i did'nt really focus on the look of the object because like i said i thought it was a plane about to crash and it did not register to me the characteristics of hand so i walk to the corner of my street in the same path it was traveling to see because like i said i thought it was going to crash and the way it was traveling there's no airport in that direction especially that close for it to be descending that low so when i got top the top of the block it was gone. now i was standing in the middle of lancaster ave that's a busy street and when i walked in the street i was so fixaded on trying to relocate the object i didnt even look for cars coming i just walked in the street looking up and around. now the strangest thing was that i stayed outside on the steps so i could tell my friend what i saw and i was outside until 5:30 a.M. now i was outside in 15 degree weather with no hat or gloves on and i was not cold i get cold very easily and i was out there for an hour and i did'nt bother me after i went in the house i came back out to talk to my friend at 6:30 a.M. before he took his daughter to catch the bus for school and be out there for two minutes i was freezing i needed gloves and a hat. i never thought i would see one but i know what i saw and it wasn't no airplane or helicopter no blimp ballons nothing of that nature i live in the ghetto and theres no reason for military flights to be flying over my neighborhood and also it was traveling so slow that if it was a plane with no engine running it would have dropped out the sky like a rock. the person i was going hunting with was awake and he didnt hear anything so if it was a plane or helicopter he would have heard it.
content.summary: Three white lights in triangle formation silent until 75 feet  away descending at slow speeds towards no airport or open fields then it vanished

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving on 58 east near danville va.  to the right of the windshield we both saw an object falling from the sky at around 10pm, thursday dec.29,2011. it was above a field to our right about 3/4 the length of a football field away from us.  it was probably about 500 ft in the air, and to me, it looked to be the size of a kids hula hoop.  it glowed green with some white in the middle.  it dissipated about 50-75 ft above the ground. it probably only lasted for 30 seconds, but it seemed like a while.
 if we hadn't both seen it, i would have never told anyone for fear of sounding insane! was wondering if anyone else witnessed this or knows what it could have been...We thought meteor?  falling star?  but definitely not fireworks!
content.summary: At first we thought it may be a "falling star", but it was too big and green in color.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside after cooking to cool off looked up to the sky and seen what i thought was a satellite so i called out family to look but the one became many.They looked like 40 0r 50 satellites moving overhead at the same speed of a satellite or the iss.I called the local news and local police dept to see if any kind of activity was going on that night there was zero activity.So i called the local news back to touch base and see if any other reports came in.When i called the lady from the news went on our local police dept face book page and seen someone had seen something the wed before.I am still amazed at what we seen and cant explain it.This is driving me crazy because i have never seen anything like this and im getting zero help.I just found this site and thought i should report it to someone who may care.
content.summary: Walked outside after cooking to cool off looked up to the sky and seen what i thought was a satellite so i called out family to look but the one became many.

content.detailedDescription:
I pulled into the parking lot at fred and reds to get dinner. still in car i happened to look up in the sky ( i don't know why) to the east, out of my drivers side window. i saw a bright light which looked alot like something i have seen about 4 times since early dec. 2011. it was still, just hovering there, not moving.I observed it for a couple of minutes. all of a sudden 3 objects that looked like blinking bright lights (sort of starlike) came out of the big light and darted around all over erratically to the north,staying fairly close to each other and then they went up higher, not real high though, but were still blinking.There were a few clouds and i observed them to move in and out of the clouds and then they stopped where they were visible and stood still.They were spaced apart but not really level with each other, still blinking. i then observed the original large light(which was to the south, and lower in the sky) to move and start floating slowly in a downward motion toward the ground until it had to be getting close to the treetops because i could no longer see it from my view because of bldgs. and trees in the way.I kept watching the smaller ones they were still blinking and sitting still and (i think i may have then seen what appeared to be an airplane? come flying past near those objects) when i got out of the car and went into the restaurant.When i came out about 30 min. later they were gone.I know what an airplane looks like in the sky.What i saw , an airplane can't do.But today when i was telling about the incident to my mom and sister, i remembered the airplane, but it was vague. weird.I was thinking at first that what i saw must be a star or a planet. there weren't that many  
stars visible,besides, it was bigger than a star,and much lower in the sky, but the few stars that were out, were up really high,where they usually are and this bright light was way, way below compared to the star or two i could see. it was just after dark.I looked over to the west to see what the sky looked like that way.....There was still a faint bit of light,with clouds, i guess from the sunset? i don't know, it was kind of pinkish, but that light was not in the eastern sky where i was looking.This is the 4th time i have seen a bright light like this since early dec. 2011, however, this is the first time i have seen objects shoot out from it and put on a show. i figure i was meant to see it for a reason, just don't know the reason? hopefully someone else saw this happen as well. i did not report the other sightings. my sister and mother who are aware of the other sightings suggested i report this to you.
thanks for listening.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a bright light hovering still...3 objects shot up and away darting then stood still blinking....The large light then started to float slowly towards the ground until it was out of sight
